  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Maximum density of the matter remaining on the numerical grid outside of the horizon as a function of the time."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import CactusTool\n",
    "\n",
    "name = 'HMNS_long'\n",
    "sim = CactusTool.load(name)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {
    "scrolled": true
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from CactusTool import TimeSeries\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from CactusTool import Units\n",
    "p = sim.Scalar(ftype='maximum')['hydrobase-rho'].dsets('rho')\n",
    "# units=('ms', 'kg/m^3')\n",
    "# t = p[0] * Units(units[0])\n",
    "# t\n",
    "fig, ax = plt.subplots()\n",
    "TimeSeries(ax, p, scale='log', unit=('ms', 'g / cm^3'), label=('time [ms]', r'$\\rho$ [g / cm^3]'))\n",
    "ax.set_title('M1.188q0.85G2')\n",
    "# ax.set_ylim(1e10, 1e16)\n",
    "plt.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## neutron drip\n",
    "\n",
    "the fact that the remnant matter is below the neutron drip threshold is an indication that a noticeable emission of neutrinos should occur within the 10 ms that follows the merger."
   ]
  },
